    Portfolio

    My notable engineering projects:

    Reconfigurable Vehicle Buck

    A full-scale, reconfigurable car interior designed for Nissan to evaluate interior layout concepts for future vehicle platforms.

    Solidworks Hands-On Machining Ansys

    Bone Biopsy Phantom

    Cast, multilayer training media for nurses to practice performing bone biopsies without need for human specimens

    Fusion360 DFM

    Laser-Cut Car

    A competitive, motorized car built to travel 10 feet as quick as possible

    Solidworks GD&T

    Extrusion Blow Molding

    Installing, Profiling, and Qualifying 2 new blow molding lines at Graham Packaging Company

    Hands-On Design and Analysis

    Pancake Flipper

    A morotized pancake flipper designed to seamlessly automate the cooking of breakfast

    SolidWorks Design and Analysis

    Semaphore Translator

    A LabVIEW based translator for interpreting nautical flag codes. This was developed over a 2-week sprint in instrumentation lab

    LABVIEW Solidworks

    Snake in Python

    A playable arcade version of snake, built from scratch on an arduino in high school

    Python Fusion360

    Let’s Build Something

    I’m always interested in meaningful engineering work, collaboration, and opportunities to learn.
